thread.title: BRIEF-Surfland Systemy Komputerowe in consortium signs contract with PKP Group
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Surfland Systemy Komputerowe in consortium signs contract with PKP Group

title: BRIEF-Surfland Systemy Komputerowe in consortium signs contract with PKP Group
text:
BRIEF-Surfland Systemy Komputerowe in consortium signs contract with PKP Group 
Oct 21 Surfland Systemy Komputerowe SA : 
* Signs in a consortium with Neo.net a contract with PKP Group for an undisclosed amount of money 
* The contract concerns the delivery and installation of camera systems on locomotives Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
